00001 //-*-C++-*-
00002 #ifndef __EpetraEllipticResult_h__
00003 #define __EpetraEllipticResult_h__
00004 #include "EllipticResult.h"
00005 
00006 // Epetra Headers
00007 #include "Epetra_ConfigDefs.h"
00008 // #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00009 // #include "mpi.h"
00010 // #include "Epetra_MpiComm.h"
00011 // #else
00012 #include "Epetra_SerialComm.h"
00013 #endif
00014 #include "Epetra_Vector.h"
00015 #include "Epetra_FECrsMatrix.h"
00016 
00017 namespace voom {
00019 
00020   struct EpetraEllipticResult: public EllipticResult
00021   {
00023     EpetraEllipticResult(Epetra_MpiComm* comm,
00024              const vector<int> & localDoF,
00025              const vector<int> & ghostDoF): 
00026       _localDoFNum(localDoF.size()), _ghostDoFNum(ghostDoF.size()),
00027       _localDoF(localDoF), _ghostDoF(ghostDoF)
00028     {
00029       // Create target and sourcemaps
00030       _targetMap = new Epetra_Map(-1, localDoF.size(), &localDoF[0], 0, *comm);
00031       _sourceMap = new Epetra_Map(-1, ghostDoF.size(), &ghostDoF[0], 0, *comm);
00032 
00033       // Create residual and stiffness matrix from source and target maps
00034       _residual       = new Epetra_Vector(*_targetMap);
00035       _ghostResidual  = new Epetra_Vector(*_sourceMap);
00036       _stiffness      = new Epetra_FECrsMatrix(Copy, *_targetMap, 10);
00037    
00038       _residual->ExtractView(&_extractedResidual);
00039       _ghostResidual->ExtractView(&_extractedGhostResidual);
00040     };
00041 
00042     ~EpetraEllipticResult() {
00043       delete _targetMap;
00044       delete _sourceMap;
00045       delete _residual;
00046       delete _ghostResidual;
00047       delete _stiffness;
00048     };
00049 
00050     // The same Epetra maps are used from Solver to create the solution vector
00051     // LEP: this is not good because we give full access to private members outside the class
00052     Epetra_Map * getTargetMap() {return _targetMap; };
00053     Epetra_Map * getSourceMap() {return _sourceMap; };
00054 
00055     // Again residual and stiffness are needed by Solver (not good as above)
00056     Epetra_Vector * getResidual() {return _residual; };
00057     Epetra_Vector * getGhostResidual() {return _ghostResidual; };
00058     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* getStiffness() {return _stiffness; };
00059     
00060     
00062     // Set functions
00063       void setResidual(int LocalIndex, Real value) {
00064     if ( LocalIndex < _localDoFNum ) {
00065       _extractedResidual[LocalIndex] = value;
00066     } 
00067     else {
00068       _extractedGhostResidual[LocalIndex - _localDoFNum] = value;
00069     }
00070       }
00071     
00072     // Reset function
00073       void resetResidualToZero() {
00074     for (uint i = 0; i < _localDoFNum; i++)
00075       _extractedResidual[i] = 0.0;
00076     for (uint i = 0; i < _ghostDoFNum; i++)
00077       _extractedGhostResidual[i] = 0.0;
00078       }
00079 
00080       void resetStiffnessToZero() {
00081     _stiffness->PutScalar(0.0);
00082       }
00083 
00084 
00085 
00086     // Add functions
00087       void addResidual(int LocalIndex, Real value) {
00088     if ( LocalIndex < _localDoFNum ) {
00089       _extractedResidual[LocalIndex] += value;
00090     } 
00091     else {
00092       _extractedGhostResidual[LocalIndex - _localDoFNum] += value;
00093     }
00094       }
00095 
00096       void addStiffness(int LocalRow, int LocalCol, Real value) {
00097     int GlobalRow = 0;
00098     int GlobalCol = 0;
00099 
00100     if ( LocalRow < _localDoFNum ) { GlobalRow = _localDoF[LocalRow]; }
00101     else { GlobalRow = _ghostDoF[LocalRow]; }
00102     
00103     if ( LocalCol < _localDoFNum ) { GlobalCol = _localDoF[LocalCol]; }
00104     else { GlobalCol = _ghostDoF[LocalCol]; }
00105 
00106     _stiffness->InsertGlobalValues(1, &GlobalRow, 1, &GlobalCol, &value);
00107       };
00108 
00109     void FinalizeGlobalStiffnessAssembly() {
00110       _stiffness->GlobalAssemble();
00111     };
00112   
00113 
00114 
00116       Real getResidual(int LocalIndex) {
00117     if ( LocalIndex < _localDoFNum ) { return _extractedResidual[LocalIndex]; } 
00118     else { return _extractedGhostResidual[LocalIndex - _localDoFNum]; }
00119       }
00120 
00121       Real getStiffness(int LocalRow, int LocalCol) {
00122     Real *Values = 0;
00123     int *Indices = 0;
00124     int numEntries = 0;  
00125     _stiffness->ExtractMyRowView(LocalRow, numEntries, Values, Indices); 
00126     
00127     map<int, int > FilledColumns;
00128     for(int m = 0; m < numEntries; m++) 
00129       FilledColumns.insert(make_pair(Indices[m], m)); // Only some columns are full
00130     
00131     if ( FilledColumns.find( LocalCol ) != FilledColumns.end() ) {
00132       return Values[FilledColumns[LocalCol] ]; }
00133     else {
00134       return 0.0; }
00135       };
00136  
00137 
00138 
00139   private:
00140     
00141     uint _localDoFNum;
00142     uint _ghostDoFNum;
00143     const vector<int> & _localDoF;
00144     const vector<int> & _ghostDoF;
00145 
00146     Epetra_Map * _targetMap;
00147     Epetra_Map * _sourceMap;
00148     
00149     Epetra_Vector * _residual;
00150     Real * _extractedResidual;
00151     Epetra_Vector * _ghostResidual;
00152     Real * _extractedGhostResidual;
00153 
00154     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* _stiffness;
00155     
00156   }; // EpetraEllipticResult 
00157 
00158 }; // namespace voom
00159 
00160 #endif
